Hospitality Financial Analytics and Strategic Planning

The "Hospitality Financial Analytics and Strategic Planning" module delves into the financial aspects of the hospitality industry, focusing on analytics and strategic planning. It covers the analysis of financial statements, including profit and loss accounts, budgets, and revenue management.Students will learn to apply investment appraisal techniques and assess the impact of economic factors on the hospitality industry. The module also emphasizes integrating sustainability and ethics into financial decision-making and utilizing technology for advanced analysis. This course prepares students for strategic financial management in hospitality.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Describe the foundational concepts of financial analytics in hospitality.

+  Analyze hospitality financial statements including P&L, budgets, and revenue management.

+  Integrate macroeconomic and microeconomic factors, and non-financial factors such as sustainability and ethics into financial decision-making.

+  Apply how to utilize technology for advanced financial analysis and strategic planning.
